authors.author: Anthony J. Showalter Elisha A. Hoffman

verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Leaning, leaning,
Leaning on
the everlasting arms.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
What a fellowship,
what a joy divine,
Leaning on
the everlasting arms!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
What a blessedness,
what a peace is mine,
Leaning on
the everlasting arms!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Oh how sweet to walk
in this pilgrim way,
Leaning on
the everlasting arms!

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Oh how bright the path
grows from day to day,
Leaning on
the everlasting arms.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
What have I to dread,
what have I to fear,
Leaning on
the everlasting arms!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
I have blessed peace
with my Lord so near,
Leaning on
the everlasting arms.
